clinical_study.brief_title: A PK/PD Study of CM4620-IE in Patients With Acute Pancreatitis
clinical_study.official_title: A Pharmacodynamic and Pharmacokinetic Study of CM4620 Injectable Emulsion (CM4620-IE) in Patients With Acute Pancreatitis

brief_summary.textblock: This open-label study will evaluate the pharmacodynamic and pharmacokinetic profile of CM4620-IE in patients with acute pancreatitis. The first five (5) patients will receive ≤ 2.08 mg/kg of CM4620-IE by continuous IV infusion on Day 1. If necessary, up to an additional 4 patients may be treated at a different dose of CM4620-IE as determined by the obtained PK and PD data. The infusion of CM4620-IE will start within 12 hours from the time the patient or LAR provides informed consent.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in IL-2 production
primary_outcome.description: The change in IL-2 production by stimulated T-lymphocytes from prior to the administration of CM4620-IE, and after completion of CM4620-IE administration.

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events [Safety and Tolerability]
secondary_outcome.description: The number of participants who experience treatment-emergent adverse events (TEAEs) with Investigator-specified relationship to CM4620-IE and assessment of severity.

intervention.description: single IV infusion on Day 1 over 4 hours
